Marple Local Delivery Local App
Marple, Stockport, Cheshire

Marple’s Local Delivery Local App provides a comprehensive list of local businesses that provide a delivery service.
Providing quality delivery services and deliveries, The Marple Delivery Local App, Marple is available for anyone to download and use.

The Marple Delivery ‘Local App’ allows the local community to call all the businesses, visit their websites or install their individual Local Apps.
This allows customers to easily call and order their local deliveries.
You can use the on page ‘Call Us Now or Website’ buttons to order your deliveries.

The Marple Deliveries ‘App icon’ is installed on your mobiles home screen.
So all you need to do when you want to order food, groceries etc is tap the icon then call or visit their websites to order.
When you want some quality products delivered to your home just use the Marple Delivery Local App.

Use the Share Icon to send the Marple Delivery Local App to your friends via Text or Email directly from the Local App.
Or scan the QR Code with your phones camera.

CLICK TO INSTALL

Local Apps can transform the way your business retains it’s customers,
whether it’s a restaurant, takeaway, hair salon or dog groomers,
a Local App means your customers are only a tap away!
Save on printing costs and increase customer retention with a Local App
You will also be searchable on ‘The Local App Store’.
